s0051: Those whose joyful heart is moved, their sound smooth slow;
s0052: Those whose happy heart is moved, their sound issue scatter;
s0053: Those whose angry heart is moved, their sound coarse fierce;
s0054: Those whose respectful heart is moved, their sound straight pure;
s0055: Those whose loving heart is moved, their sound harmonious soft.
s0056: Six not nature, moved by things then act, thus former kings careful what move them.
s0057: Thus ritual to guide their will, music to harmonize their sound, governance to unify their conduct, punishment to guard their evil.

s0060: Feelings move within, thus form in sound, sound forms pattern called sound.
s0061: Thus orderly age sound peaceful joyful, its correct harmony;
s0062: Chaotic age sound resentful angry, its correct contrary;
s0063: Perished state sound sorrowful thoughtful, its people distressed.
s0065: Gong for ruler, shang for minister, jue for people, zhi for affairs, yu for things.
s0066: Five not chaotic, then no worried sounds.
s0067: Gong chaotic then wild, its ruler arrogant;
s0068: Shang chaotic then strike, its ministers ruined;
s0069: Jue chaotic then worry, its people resentful;
s0070: Zhi chaotic then sorrow, its affairs diligent;
s0071: Yu chaotic then dangerous, its wealth scarce.
s0072: Five all chaotic, mutually invade, called slow.
s0073: Thus then state's extinction no day.
